item.title: DyVo: Dynamic Vocabularies for Learned Sparse Retrieval with Entities
item.description: DyVo boosts learned sparse retrieval by dynamically adding Wikipedia entities to the vocabulary, significantly improving accuracy and relevance in entity-rich datasets.

item.title: Neural Metamorphosis
item.description: NeuMeta learns a continuous weight manifold for neural networks, enabling the generation of any-sized network without retraining, even for unseen configurations.
